title: Relates to monies received by the Highland Falls-Fort Montgomery central school district
summary: Relates to moneys received by the Highland Falls-Fort Montgomery central school district.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3185

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. CALHOUN -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Education

       AN ACT relating to monies received by the Highland Falls-Fort Montgomery
         central school district

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Notwithstanding any other provision of law to the contrary,
    2  for  the  purposes  of  state  aid,  the  Highland Falls-Fort Montgomery
    3  Central School District, which receives federal monies pursuant to Title
    4  VIII of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (ESEA)  shall
    5  utilize  and  include  such  monies  when computing the residential real
    6  property tax levy pursuant to subparagraph 1 of paragraph a of  subdivi-
    7  sion 16 of section 3602 of the education law.
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02804-01-1
actClause: AN ACT relating to monies received by the Highland Falls-Fort Montgomery central school district
